sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"不同的"之意。
means: different ： 普通用词，强调事物间的区别或本质的不同。有时侧重对比，不着重差别。
various ： 通常强调种类的数目。
diverse ： 语气较强，指性质完全不同，着重显著的区别。

sentence.Network_en: India has always been one of the most religiously diverse countries.
sentence.Network_cn: 印度一直都是宗教信仰最多元的国家之一。

sentence.Network_en: The Judaeo-Christian tradition is diverse, jumbled, contradictory, at every point inviting inquiry and debate.
sentence.Network_cn: 犹太-基督教传统呈现多样化，混乱复杂，相互矛盾，在各个方面都会引发质疑和争论。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... conversant a 亲近的 diverse a 不同的 diiversify v 多样化.
普特英语听力_百度文库 ... dispose vi. 除掉;处置;解决;处理 diverse a. 不同的，多种多样的 decline v. 拒绝，谢绝;下降.
六级听力必备1000词。_sallyzhao520_新浪博客 ... 24. ideological 意识形式上 25. diverse 多种多样 26. coalition 联合.
多样化的（diverse）教育主张，面对各种有不同需求的学生，不应实施死板划一的教育。未来的教育必须提供与每一个学生需求相适 …

list.abs: HR专业英语_百度文库 ... 跨国公司:( multinational corporation,MNC) 管理多样性:( managing diversity) 三、工作:( job).
天线分集（Antenna Diversity）即对空间资源的初步利用，至于更充分利用讯号方向性的做法是波束形成（Beamforming）技术，波束 …
（1）遗传多样性(genetic diversity)遗传多样性是生物多样性的重要组成部分。广义的遗传多样性是指地球上生物所携带的各种遗传信 …
托福词汇表_百度文库 ... chew 咀嚼 biological diversity 生物多样性动物学词汇（中） sense 感官.

entry.tran: 形形色色的;各式各样的
entry.def: If a group or range of things is diverse, it is made up of a wide variety of things.

example.ex: ...shops selling a diverse range of gifts...
Society is now much more diverse than ever before.
example.tran: 当今社会较之以往任何时候都要丰富多彩得多。

entry.def: Diverse people or things are very different from each other.

example.ex: Jones has a much more diverse and perhaps younger audience.
example.tran: 琼斯的观众群更为多样化而且可能更年轻。

sentences.sentence: "celebrities as diverse as Bob Hope and Bob Dylan"
"animals as various as the jaguar and the cavy and the sloth"

auth_sentence.content: Jammu and Kashmir is diverse in religion and culture.
auth_sentence.res_content: Jammu and Kashmir is diverse in religion and culture.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Jammu and Kashmir is diverse in religion and culture.

auth_sentence.content: It is really a very multi-national and diverse flow.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is really a very multi-national and diverse flow.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is really a very multi-national and diverse flow.

auth_sentence.content: Post jobs regularly and ensure a diverse candidate slate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Post jobs regularly and ensure a diverse candidate slate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Post jobs regularly and ensure a diverse candidate slate.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad向+vers转+e→转向不利的
a坏+vers转+e→往坏转→反感的
con一起+verse=vers转+ant……的→在一起转→很熟悉的
con共同+vers转+e→两个共同对着转→相反的
di分开+vers转+e→转开了→不同的
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的
ir不+reversible[adj.可逆的]→adj.不可逆转的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 刚愎自用的,故意作对的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per始终+vers转+e→一直和别人拧着转
re反+vers转+e→反转的
reverse反转的+ible可..的→可反转的,可逆的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 横向的, 横断的, 截线的
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans横+vers转+al……的→adj.横向的, 横断的, 截线的 n.[数学]截线, 横肌

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍的, 全体的, 通用的, 宇宙的, 世界的
stems_affixes.word_buile: universe[n.宇宙,万物]+al表形容词→宇宙的→普遍的, 全体的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通用的;多才多艺的,多方面的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vers转+atile→玩得转,有才能的
vers转+ed……的→转过的,已经熟练了→熟练的
adverse[adj.逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的]+ary人→n.对手,敌手
adverse[adj.逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的]+ity表名词→n.不幸,灾难
anni=ann+vers转+ary表名词→一年转到一次→周年纪念日
averse[adj.厌恶的,反对的]+ion表名词→n.嫌恶,憎恨
converse[v.谈话,交谈,认识]+ation表名词→n.会话,谈话
con共同+vers转+e→两个共同对着转→相反的
con共同+vers转+ion表名词→n.转变,转换;信仰的改变

stems_affixes.value_cn: 转向,转移;牵制;解闷;娱乐
stems_affixes.word_buile: di离开+vers转+ion表名词→转偏离→转向
diverse多样的+ity表名词→n.多样,变化万千
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 腐败行为, 渎职, 贪污, 盗用
stems_affixes.word_buile: mal坏+vers转+ation表名词→转坏了→做官做坏
perverse[adj.刚愎自用的,故意作对的]+ity表名词→n.刚愎,背理行为
trans横+vers转+al……的→adj.横向的, 横断的, 截线的 n.[数学]截线, 横肌
uni一个+vers转+e→统一旋转,宇宙
universe[n.宇宙,万物]+ity表名词→由宇宙引申为知识,知识之地→大学

stems_affixes.value_cn: 多才多艺;用途广泛,万能
stems_affixes.word_buile: versatile[adj.通用的;多才多艺的,多方面的]+ity表名词→n.多才多艺;用途广泛,万能
vers转+e→转着反复说的话
vers转+ion表名词→从原文转过来的→译文
diverse多样的+ify……化→v.使不同;[使]多样化
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的

Sentence.sentence: Recent reports found that lodging with a student of a different race may decrease prejudice and compel students to engage in more ethnically diverse friendships.
Interracial lodging may have diverse outcomes
This is then coupled to a school's picture of what a diverse class should look like, with the result that passport, ethnic origin and sex can all become influencing factors.

During the presidential campaign, Barack Obama assembled a racially and ideologically diverse coalition with his message of hope and change; as the reality of life under a new administration settles in, some of those supporters might become disillusioned.
Young people in America are now more diverse ideologically

jushi.english: My sister and I have diverse ideal on how to raise children.
jushi.chinese: 在怎样教育孩子的问题上,我和我姐姐有迥然不同的看法。

jushi.english: There are diverse birds in the forest.
The word is now used in a sense diverse from the original meaning.
jushi.chinese: 此字现在的用意与原来的不一样。
